title: Yevgeni Kornyukhin
text:
Yevgeni Vasilyevich Kornyukhin (; born 7 March 1967) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> coach and a former player. He is a goalkeepers' coach with <a href="FC%20Khimki">FC Khimki</a>.
Club career.
He made his professional debut in the <a href="Soviet%20Second%20League">Soviet Second League</a> in 1988 for <a href="FC%20Pakhtakor%20Andijan">FC Pakhtakor Andijan</a>.
